column4: hi guys... does anybody know how can I configure the multimedia keys on sony vaio (ubuntu 9.10)?
i gave up on that long ago.. seems like a pain
:(   I have a HP Pavilion and it works fine
there is some vaio kernel module that should enable them, but sony isnt very informative about their hardware, so writing stuff for it seems to be a pain
even light control doesnt work on mine :(
yet ubuntu is running fine and i can live without
have a look at this site: http://www.linux-laptop.net/sony.html
sure... but I'm trying to make everything works because is a new laptop :)
I tried this site, but there is no my model
hang on a sec.. i am checking something with the kernel module
is the sony_laptop module loaded? lsmod | grep "sony"
